t: Pukemark, Sweatyrocks, Demonlick: Made-for-Amazon Brand Names Are Getting Ridiculously Surreal
s: October 14, 2020 - Sometimes, brand names really matter. Whereas people may automatically think of DeWalt for drills or Coleman for camping chairs, they’re also happy to purchase an Opove massage gun or FRETREE winter gloves, even though these can only be found on Amazon and have only existed for a year or two.
